createTempToken(string,string,uint256).details: createTempToken is a function to create a new TempToken.name is the name of the token.symbol is the symbol of the token.duration is the duration in seconds for the lifespan of the TempToken.The function returns the address of the new TempToken.

getTokenInfo(address).details: getTokenInfo is a function to get the TokenInfo struct of a deployed token.tokenAddress is the address of the deployed token.The function returns the TokenInfo struct of the deployed token.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setFeeDestination(address).details: The following functions are used to set the default protocol fee destination,  protocol fee percentage, streamer fee percentage, pause the factory, set total supply threshold, and set the max duration.These functions are only callable by the owner of the factory.

setTotalSupplyThresholdForTokens(uint256.details: The following functions are used to set the total supply threshold for tokens,  increase the end timestamp for tokens, set the max duration, and pause the factory.These functions are only callable by the owner or an admin of the factory.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

admins.details: admins is a mapping of addresses to a boolean value. If the boolean value is true, the address is an admin. If the boolean value is false, the address is not an admin.

defaultProtocolFeePercent.details: defaultProtocolFeePercent is the default protocol fee percentage. ex: 2% = 2 * 10**16 = 20000000000000000.defaultStreamerFeePercent is the default streamer fee percentage. ex: 2% = 2 * 10**16 = 20000000000000000.defaultProtocolFeeDestination is the default protocol fee destination address.isPaused is a boolean to pause the token creation function.maxDuration is the max duration in seconds for the lifespan of the TempToken.totalSupplyThreshold is the total supply needed for the token to convert from a TempToken into a normal, permanent token.  This total supply will be adjusted by us depending on various factors. The goal of each TempToken is to have hit this threshold by the time the duration has expired. IT'S A GAME.

numDeployedTokens.details: numDeployedTokens is the number of deployed tokens.deployedTokenIndices is a mapping of token addresses to their assigned index.deployedTokens is a mapping of token indices to TokenInfo structs.
